meta.description: The system shall be able to analyze its own test failures.
acceptanceCriteria: When a test fails, a TestFailure artifact is created.
The TestFailure artifact includes the test name and error message.
The system can correlate the failure with code coverage data.

meta.description: The system shall maintain a list of functionality requirements.
acceptanceCriteria: Requirements are stored in a machine-readable format (JSON).
Requirements can be loaded and parsed by a script.
Each requirement has a description and acceptance criteria.
